sentences.en: Crystal Spirit unseated his rider in the Berkshire Hurdle at Newbury.
sentences.cn: 在纽伯里举行的伯克郡障碍赛中“水玉精灵”把骑师掀了下来。

sentences.en: Finding enough money for the project was the first hurdle.
sentences.cn: 第一道难关是为该项目筹措足够的资金。

sentences.en: Getting started in photography is sometimes a formidable hurdle.
sentences.cn: 在摄影技术上起步有时候是一项难以克服的障碍.

sentences.en: Hurdle running is a kind of cyclic exercise with dissymmetrical maximal intensity.
sentences.cn: 跨栏跑是一项极限强度非对称的周期性运动.

sentences.en: Hurdle technology is the essential events of food preservation.
sentences.cn: 栅栏技术是食品保藏的根本所在.

sentences.en: I defy you to jump that high hurdle.
sentences.cn: 我倒要看看你能不能跳过那高栏.

sentences.en: Once he had leaped the psychological hurdle toward decision the momentum of preparation took over.
sentences.cn: 一旦当他逾越了心理上的障碍而做出决定时,准备的势头就开始了.

sentences.en: Once he had leaped the psychological hurdle, preparation took over.
sentences.cn: 一旦他逾越了心理上的障碍, 准备也就开始了.

sentences.en: She clocked 11.6 seconds for the 80 metre hurdle.
sentences.cn: 八十米跳栏赛跑她跑了十一秒六.

sentences.en: She learnt to hurdle by leaping over bales of hay on her family's farm.
sentences.cn: 她通过在自家农场里跳跨干草捆学会了跨栏。

sentences.en: Software may turn out to be a bigger hurdle.
sentences.cn: 软件可能成为更大的障碍.

sentences.en: The more the financial system costs to run, the higher the hurdle.
sentences.cn: 金融体系的运作成本越高,障碍就越大.

sentences.en: The weather will be the biggest hurdle so I have to be ready.
sentences.cn: 天气将会是最大的障碍，所以我必须要作好准备。

sentences.en: Too few members of the lower or middle class could jump this hurdle.
sentences.cn: 下等和中等阶级中,很少有人能超越上述的鸿沟.

sentences.en: With her speed and agility, Cage cut out all her competitors in the hurdle race.
sentences.cn: 凯奇在跨栏赛跑中速度快、动作敏捷, 击败了所有其他选手.

sentences.en: Write down the world record for the 110 - meter - hurdle race for males.
sentences.cn: 写下世界纪录为110米跨栏跑,为男性.

words.tran_cn: 制造竹篱笆者；跳栏比赛选手

phrases.tran_cn: n. 障碍竞赛；跳栏赛跑

trans.tran_cn: 障碍，困难，跳栏，障碍赛跑，[史]囚笼，囚车
trans.tran_en: a problem or difficulty that you must deal with before you can achieve something

trans.tran_cn: 克服困难，越过障碍，参加跨栏赛跑
跳过障碍，跳栏，用疏篱围住，克服困难
